document_data.caption: A tightrope
document_data.name: Tightrope
document_data.mainbody: '''Tightropes''' were a type of rope in the Realms popular among [[bard]]s and [[acrobat]]s who performed balancing acts upon them.
document_data.Description: Most tightropes were made from banded [[steel]] cables.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 6 [[gold piece]]s.
